original_text:
100 Flaring Fruits
Una slot essenziale
Per i nostalgici, per chi in un gioco cerca poche regole ma che siano chiare, per tutti quelli che amano l’essenzialità, è da poco sbarcata in tutti i maggiori casinò online 100 Flaring Fruits, la slot a tema frutta della software house Gamomat.
Che siamo di fronte a un gioco basato più sulla sostanza che sulle apparenze lo si capisce già da una prima occhiata: i simboli sono di grandi dimensioni, con contorni netti e colori brillanti, privi di tridimensionalità e di animazioni. Ciò non vuol dire che siano disegnati male, tutt’altro, il lavoro fatto sulla grafica è di prima qualità. La trama della griglia di gioco nera fa risaltare in modo perfetto le icone, creando un bel contrasto con i bordi arancioni della griglia. I vari pulsanti sono ben distanziati dai rulli, lasciando una visuale perfetta delle giocate.
La musica arcade che accompagna gli Spins è un altro tuffo negli anni ’80, per una slot che possiede tutte le carte in regola per diventare un grande classico del gioco online.
 
Caratteristiche della slot
100 Flaring Fruits utilizza una griglia con 5 rulli e 4 righe e ben 100 linee di pagamento.
Il costo di ogni Spin varia tra 1 € e 100 €, con una vincita massima che raggiunge i 5.000x. Si vince associando almeno 3 simboli identici su una paylines, partendo dal rullo di sinistra e procedendo verso destra.
È presente la funzione Autoplay, ma a differenza di tanti altri giochi non è possibile stabilire un numero di giri e sarà necessario fermarli manualmente. È consigliabile quindi tenere d’occhio il saldo per non avere brutte sorprese.
La volatilità è bassa, mentre il ritorno teorico al giocatore (RTP) è del 96,13%.
 
Simboli e funzionalità
Entriamo ora nel vivo del gioco illustrando i simboli e le relative vincite. Ciliegie, limone, prugna e arancia hanno tutti lo stesso valore, a seguire troviamo l’uva e l’anguria. Per avere una panoramica esaustiva sui pagamenti consigliamo sempre di accedere alla tabella dei pagamenti che si trova all’interno del menù.
Il numero 7 è il Wild e sostituisce tutti i simboli eccetto lo Scatter, inoltre in una combo di cinque paga più di ogni altro simbolo regolare.
La stella è lo Scatter ed è il simbolo più remunerativo in assoluto. La vincita generata dallo Scatter si va a sommare ad altre eventuali vincite con simboli base.
Sono presenti ben due giochi Gamble che ci permettono di raddoppiare la vincita: nel primo lo scopo è indovinare il colore della carta estratta dal mazzo, nel secondo dovremo raggiungere l’ultimo gradino di una scala azzeccando il momento corretto in cui cliccare.

Domande Frequenti 
A quanto corrisponde la vincita massima di 100 Flaring Fruits?

In questa slot si può vincere al massimo 5.000 volte la scommessa.



Su quali dispositivi posso giocare a 100 Flaring Fruits?

Su qualsiasi dispositivo, fisso o mobile. Questa slot funziona su MacOS, Windows e Linus per i pc, su IOS e Android per i dispositivi mobili.



A quanto corrisponde il ritorno teorico al giocatore?

Il valore RTP è del 96,13%.

raw_translation.response:
100 Flaring Fruits: a simple but essential slot game.

For those who seek a game with clear rules and minimalistic design, 100 Flaring Fruits has just arrived in all major online casinos. Developed by Gamomat, this fruit-themed slot game focuses more on substance than on appearances, with large symbols, sharp lines, and bright colors lacking in animation and three-dimensionality. But don't be fooled by the simplicity of the graphics – the quality of the design is top-notch, with a black game grid that contrasts perfectly with the orange frame and well-spaced buttons, allowing for a perfect view of your gameplay.

100 Flaring Fruits has 5 reels with 4 rows and 100 paylines, with each spin's cost varying from €1 to €100. The maximum winning payout is 5,000x the bet, with winning combinations requiring at least three identical symbols on a payline, starting from the leftmost reel and proceeding to the right. While there is an Autoplay option available, it does not allow for a set number of spins, so keep an eye on your balance to avoid any surprises.

The game has low volatility, with a theoretical Return to Player (RTP) of 96.13%. The symbols and corresponding payouts include cherries, lemon, plum, and oranges with the same value, followed by grapes and watermelon. The number 7 symbol is the Wild and replaces all symbols except the Scatter, with a combo of five paying more than any other regular symbols. The star is the Scatter and the most lucrative symbol of all, with the Scatter's winnings added to the base symbol's winnings.

Two Gamble games are also available, allowing players to double their winnings by guessing the color of a playing card or reaching the last step of a ladder game at the correct time.

In summary, this slot game is reminiscent of the 80s with an arcade-style soundtrack and has all the makings of a classic online game with its straightforward gameplay and impressive payouts. You can play 100 Flaring Fruits on any device, whether it be a desktop, laptop, or mobile device, on MacOS, Windows, Linux, iOS or Android, making it easily accessible to all experienced gamblers.

raw_translation.response:
100 Flaring Fruits: A Classic Slot Game for the Experienced Gambler

For those seeking a simple game with clear rules and a nostalgic theme, the fruit-themed slot game 100 Flaring Fruits from software house Gamomat has recently arrived in all major online casinos. With symbols that are large, brightly colored, and lacking in 3D animation, this game is substance over style. However, don't mistake simplicity for poor design. The graphics are of top quality, with the black game board perfectly highlighting the icons and creating a nice contrast against the orange edges. The various buttons are well-spaced, allowing for an unobstructed view of the action.

The arcade-style music that accompanies the spins is another throwback to the 80s, making 100 Flaring Fruits a game with all the makings of a great online classic.

Game Features:

100 Flaring Fruits uses a 5x4 grid and 100 paylines. The cost of each spin ranges from €1 to €100, with a maximum win of 5,000x. Wins are achieved by matching at least three identical symbols on a payline from left to right. 

The game includes an Autoplay function, although unlike other games, you cannot set a specific number of spins, so it's important to keep an eye on your balance. The game has low volatility, while the theoretical return to player (RTP) is 96.13%.

Symbols and Features:

Now, let's talk about the symbols and their corresponding payouts. Cherries, lemons, plums, and oranges all have the same value, followed by grapes and watermelons. For a complete overview of the payouts, access the paytable within the menu.

The number 7 is the Wild and replaces all symbols except the Scatter. Additionally, a combo of five Wilds pays more than any other regular symbol. The star is the Scatter and is the most lucrative symbol in the game. The Scatter win is added to any other base symbol wins.

There are two Gamble games which allow players to double their winnings: in the first, players must guess the color of a card drawn from a deck, while in the second, players must reach the final level of a ladder and click at the correct moment.

FAQs:

What is the maximum win in 100 Flaring Fruits?

The maximum win in this slot can be up to 5,000 times the bet.

On what devices can I play 100 Flaring Fruits?

This slot works on any device, whether fixed or mobile. It is compatible with MacOS, Windows, and Linux for PCs, and iOS and Android for mobile devices.

What is the theoretical return to player?

The RTP value is 96.13%.

Review: 100 Flaring Fruits: A Classic Slot Game for the Experienced Gambler

For those seeking a simple game with clear rules and a nostalgic theme, the fruit-themed slot game 100 Flaring Fruits from software house Gamomat has recently arrived in all major online casinos. With symbols that are large, brightly colored, and lacking in 3D animation, this game is substance over style. However, don't mistake simplicity for poor design. The graphics are of top quality, with the black game board perfectly highlighting the icons and creating a nice contrast against the orange edges. The various buttons are well-spaced, allowing for an unobstructed view of the action.

The arcade-style music that accompanies the spins is another throwback to the 80s, making 100 Flaring Fruits a game with all the makings of a great online classic.

Game Features:

100 Flaring Fruits uses a 5x4 grid and 100 paylines. The cost of each spin ranges from €1 to €100, with a maximum win of 5,000x. Wins are achieved by matching at least three identical symbols on a payline from left to right. 

The game includes an Autoplay function, although unlike other games, you cannot set a specific number of spins, so it's important to keep an eye on your balance. The game has low volatility, while the theoretical return to player (RTP) is 96.13%.

Symbols and Features:

Now, let's talk about the symbols and their corresponding payouts. Cherries, lemons, plums, and oranges all have the same value, followed by grapes and watermelons. For a complete overview of the payouts, access the paytable within the menu.

The number 7 is the Wild and replaces all symbols except the Scatter. Additionally, a combo of five Wilds pays more than any other regular symbol. The star is the Scatter and is the most lucrative symbol in the game. The Scatter win is added to any other base symbol wins.

There are two Gamble games which allow players to double their winnings: in the first, players must guess the color of a card drawn from a deck, while in the second, players must reach the final level of a ladder and click at the correct moment.

FAQs:

What is the maximum win in 100 Flaring Fruits?

The maximum win in this slot can be up to 5,000 times the bet.

On what devices can I play 100 Flaring Fruits?

This slot works on any device, whether fixed or mobile. It is compatible with MacOS, Windows, and Linux for PCs, and iOS and Android for mobile devices.

What is the theoretical return to player?

The RTP value is 96.13%.

faq.question: What devices are compatible with 100 Flaring Fruits?
faq.answer: You can play this game on any device, including MacOS, Windows, Linux, iOS, and Android.

Review: 100 Flaring Fruits: A Classic Slot Game for the Experienced Gambler

For those seeking a simple game with clear rules and a nostalgic theme, the fruit-themed slot game 100 Flaring Fruits from software house Gamomat has recently arrived in all major online casinos. With symbols that are large, brightly colored, and lacking in 3D animation, this game is substance over style. However, don't mistake simplicity for poor design. The graphics are of top quality, with the black game board perfectly highlighting the icons and creating a nice contrast against the orange edges. The various buttons are well-spaced, allowing for an unobstructed view of the action.

The arcade-style music that accompanies the spins is another throwback to the 80s, making 100 Flaring Fruits a game with all the makings of a great online classic.

Game Features:

100 Flaring Fruits uses a 5x4 grid and 100 paylines. The cost of each spin ranges from €1 to €100, with a maximum win of 5,000x. Wins are achieved by matching at least three identical symbols on a payline from left to right. 

The game includes an Autoplay function, although unlike other games, you cannot set a specific number of spins, so it's important to keep an eye on your balance. The game has low volatility, while the theoretical return to player (RTP) is 96.13%.

Symbols and Features:

Now, let's talk about the symbols and their corresponding payouts. Cherries, lemons, plums, and oranges all have the same value, followed by grapes and watermelons. For a complete overview of the payouts, access the paytable within the menu.

The number 7 is the Wild and replaces all symbols except the Scatter. Additionally, a combo of five Wilds pays more than any other regular symbol. The star is the Scatter and is the most lucrative symbol in the game. The Scatter win is added to any other base symbol wins.

There are two Gamble games which allow players to double their winnings: in the first, players must guess the color of a card drawn from a deck, while in the second, players must reach the final level of a ladder and click at the correct moment.

FAQs:

What is the maximum win in 100 Flaring Fruits?

The maximum win in this slot can be up to 5,000 times the bet.

On what devices can I play 100 Flaring Fruits?

This slot works on any device, whether fixed or mobile. It is compatible with MacOS, Windows, and Linux for PCs, and iOS and Android for mobile devices.

What is the theoretical return to player?

The RTP value is 96.13%.
